metadata.title: CVE-2023-38252 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read flaw was found in w3m, in the Strnew_size function in Str.c. This issue may allow an attacker to cause a denial of service through a crafted HTML file.

criterions.comment: w3m package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
